Quick Start¶

This is quick start.
program is controlled by running script.
Goto directory
$ cd [UNIXMDHOME]/quick_start/

Define system¶

mol = Molecule(~~~)

Define MD method¶

import and make object md = EH(~~~)

Run MD¶

each md module has ‘run’ method which actually run~~~ md.run(~~~)

files~~~~~,simple explanation
